common.not_logged: You need to be authenticated to execute this command; please log in with squarecloud auth login.

commit.short: Make a commit for your application

logs.short: View the most recent logs of your application

root.short: Manage your applications with these commands

start.short: Send a start signal to start your application

restart.short: Send a restart signal to restart your application's process

stop.short: Send a stop signal to stop your application's process

status.short: View the statuses of all your applications

root.short: Manage your Square Cloud login with these commands

login.short: Log in to Square Cloud, required to run some CLI commands.

whoami.short: View the username and account ID you are authenticated as

create.short: Create a new backup of your application and download it to your machine

arguments.missing: You not specified your application ID in command arguments
arguments.missing_2: You can also specify an ID parameter in your squarecloud.app

upload.error: Unable to send application to Square Cloud due to: {{ .Error }}

states.uploading: Uploading the zip file to Square Cloud.

delete.success: Your application has been successfuly deleted

list.empty: You don't have any application active

signal.failed: Failed to send the signal to your application
signal.success: Signal {{.Signal}} has been successfully sent to your application.

snapshot.error: Unable to download your snapshot, please try again later...
snapshot.success: Your snapshot was successfully downloaded to {{ .File }}

input.label: Your API Token:
input.placeholder: Insert your Square Cloud API token

login.error: No user associated for this Square Cloud Token

success.0: Your API Token has successfuly changed! You are now logged in a {{.User}}
success.1: With great power comes great responsibility!

warnings.no_plan: It looks like you donâ€™t have any active plan at the moment; get a plan at {{ .Link }}.

logout.success: You have successfully logged out of your Square Cloud account.

logged.plan: You are currently logged in as {{.User.Name}} on the {{ .User.Plan }} plan.
logged.remaining: You have {{ if lt .User.PlanRemaining 1 }}a few hours{{ else }}{{ .User.PlanRemaining }} days{{ end }} left before your plan expires.
logged.expired: Your plan has expired or you do not have an active plan; get a plan at {{ .Link }}.

zip.failed: It was not possible to make the zip of your application
zip.success: Your source has successfuly zipped to {{.Zip}}
